name: Magical Taruruuto-kun: Magic Adventure
overview: An action platformer based on the Magical Taluluto manga and anime. Like its source, the game is bright and colorful and features a comedic sensibility. It's one of several games to be based on the license.The game is superficially similar to Wonder Boy in Monster Land, with its inclusion of currency and shops that allow Taluluto to purchase upgrades.
